question: Which one of the following was not recommended for Panchayatiraj by Thungon Committee?
option3: Dist. Collector to be Chief Executive of Zila Parishad
explanation: Three year term was not recommended for Panchayatiraj by Thungon Committee which was a Consultative committee of parliament appoints a sub-committee under chairpersonship of P.K. Thungon to consider constitutional Amendment.
